channel.title: Hi Guys
channel.description:
Not sure if this is the right place to post this, but anyways
hey guys, I registered not too long ago and have been lurking around since. I never got to make my first post, but here it is :P I'm not too late
I'm an active member on Sythe, but the programming section there is pretty much dead :( I'm here because the programming section is fairly active, and I'd like to test my skills in RS private servers and bots.
Hope to see you guys around
peace

item.title: Hi Guys
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Welcome to the wonderful world of MoparScape. You should hit up the IRC sometime, it’s a pretty relaxed environment with a lot of guys who know what they’re doing so you could get a bit of help.

Read full topic

item.title: Hi Guys
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

welcome

[quote=“naseem142, post:2, topic:538682”]Welcome to our friendly community , where hate , trolling and noobs do not exist!
[size=3pt]lol , yeah right.[/size][/quote]
the only place people get nasty are the rs2 development sections lol, people in the general programming sections are pretty nice and helpful (usually)

Read full topic
